[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1628691027808{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/banner-comm.jpg?id=9042) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”hidden-phone”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1628691020568{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 500px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_row_inner el_class=”.page-constrain”][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1628691046618{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text color=”#ffffff” font_family=”Playfair Display”]

Commercial Painting and Decorating
Services across London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
Tailored for winning businesses:
offices, retail, hospitality and other commercial spaces
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[vc_column_text color=”#ffffff”]
  • Our flexible service will work around your business needs
  • Quick response and available to book for as soon as the next day
  • Our professional painters and decorators have a minimum of 5 years experience
  • Extended Health & Safety, Insurance, and Warranty
  • Delivering the highest standard painting and decorating jobs in London
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1628691436243{background: #efebe7 url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/The-Good-Painter-white-smaller.png?id=213) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”50% 35%”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575910714876{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1575910701465{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

We deliver excellent commercial painting and decorating services in London

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Although we are also running a business, we promise you this: yours comes first. Delivering painting and decorating projects in a short time frame, completed to the high standard and within budget.

See Our Company Brochure
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1626953944111{background: #efebe7 url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/The-Good-Painter-white-smaller.png?id=213) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”50% 70%”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575910737414{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1575910795673{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”]

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We are painting and decorating different types of commercial projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We can paint any project, big or small, with no disturbance to your business

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1567527809223{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/5″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9043″ img_size=”500X500″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/office-painting-and-decorating/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Offices painting and decorating

Get your office painted and decorated in a short time frame, completed and delivered to a high standard finish and within budget.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1626950364154{background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers say about us and
painting and decorating jobs we have completed across London

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552923219689{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_row_inner]

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1626951848573{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]
